name: Off the Path
description:
Off the Path tells the tale of a group of friends, stuck in a hut after a snowstorm. Their only hope is Grandpas Scarf making it to the town.

On the way, you will uncover the mystery of the cursed mountain and learn the story of your lost grandpa.

Collect all cassette tapes to reveal the full story.

(this is our first game using Unreal Engine, so it might be a bit buggy)

----------------------------------------

Controls Move: W, A, S, D

Look around: Mouse

----------------------------------------

This game was made by BERO games, as an entry for the Snappy Gurus Game Off – Winter 2023 Game Jam.
